name: Diva Luma
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

traits.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, Diva Luma has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Diva Luma scores against a {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} creature is a critical hit.

traits.name: Evasion
entries: If Diva Luma is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Diva Luma instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The assassin deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Diva Luma that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Diva Luma doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Diva Luma makes two high-heeled shoe attacks.

actions.name: High-Heeled Shoe
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
